name: 30-Minute Fartlek Run
description: Speed play intervals for outdoor running - mix of fast and recovery paces

activity.name: Fast/Recovery
activity.notes: 1 min hard (80-90% effort), 2 min easy recovery jog

activity.name: Tempo Run
activity.notes: Comfortably hard - can speak in short phrases

activity.name: Easy Jog to Walk
activity.notes: Gradually slow to walk, shake out legs

tips: Listen to your body - adjust intensity as needed
Use landmarks for interval triggers if preferred
Stay hydrated, especially in warm weather
